Title: Evidence for a surface gold hydride on a nanostructured gold catalyst
Abstract: © 2016 The Royal Society of Chemistry.Inelastic neutron scattering shows formation of a surface Au-H species, of key importance for the study of catalytic mechanisms. Previous assignment of this feature in the infrared as a purely Ce3+ transition is shown to be erroneous on reducing the catalyst using hydrogen and deuterium.
